doc:
Jon Paul Steuer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jon_Paul_Steuer 0 Jon Paul Steuer (March 27, 1984 – January 1, 2018) was an American actor and musician, best known for being the first actor to play Alexander Rozhenko in Star Trek: The Next Generation and for being the first actor to regularly portray Quentin Kelly on the ABC show Grace Under Fire. He was also well known for playing Johnny "Viper" Vennaro in the 1994 children's comedy film Little Giants. After spending several years as a musician, Steuer entered the culinary industry and owned his own restaurant in Portland, Oregon. Jon_Paul_Steuer ( March_27_,_1984 – January_1_,_2018 ) was an_American_actor_and_musician , best_known for being the_first_actor to_play Alexander_Rozhenko in Star_Trek : The_Next_Generation and for being the_first_actor to_regularly_portray Quentin_Kelly on the_ABC_show_Grace Under Fire . He was_also_well_known for playing Johnny_"_Viper_"_Vennaro in the_1994_children 's_comedy_film_Little_Giants . After spending several_years as a_musician , Steuer entered the_culinary_industry and owned his_own_restaurant in Portland , Oregon .
